subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sonny Weems scored a career-high 20 points, Jose Calderon had 16 and the Toronto Raptors ended a four-game losing streak Friday night by beating the visiting Knicks, 102-96.
snippet: Sonny Weems scored a career-high 20 points, Jose Calderon had 16 and the Toronto Raptors ended a four-game losing streak Friday night by beating the visiting Knicks, 102-96.
